text: The cantons of Marseille are administrative divisions of the Bouches-du-Rhône department, in southeastern France. Since the French canton reorganisation which came into effect in March 2015, the city of Marseille is subdivided into 12 cantons. Their seat is in Marseille.Décret n° 2014-271 du 27 février 2014 portant délimitation des cantons dans le département des Bouches-du-Rhône == Cantons == {| class="wikitable" ! Name !!
